name: Cat Burglar in: Courageous Art Theft (Orioli)
name_original: Cat Burglar in: Courageous Art Theft (Orioli)
description:
A short game created for the Machina x Museom of Contemporary Art Zagreb Game Jam.

The theme of the Game Jam was "Robbery in the Museum", so my team and I decided to go for the obvious solution to the theme of the game.

We were awarded second place in the Game Jam.
